metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35474 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In MediaWiki before 1.35.1, the combination of Html::rawElement andMessage::text leads to XSS because the definition ofMediaWiki:recentchanges-legend-watchlistexpiry can be changed onwiki sothat the output is raw HTML.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
